front.title: Transport of Ethernet Frames over L2TPv3

abstract.t: This document describes the transport of Ethernet frames over Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol (L2TPv3). This includes the transport of Ethernet port to port frames as well as the transport of Ethernet VLAN frames. The mechanism described in this document can be used in the creation of Pseudo Wires to transport Ethernet frames over an IP network.
